definitions.text: someone new to a field or activity
someone who has been admitted to membership in a scholarly field
people who have been introduced to the mysteries of some field or activity
examples: it is very familiar to the initiate

definitions.text: take the lead or initiative in; participate in the development of
examples: This South African surgeon pioneered heart transplants

definitions.text: accept people into an exclusive society or group, usually with some rite
examples: African men are initiated when they reach puberty

definitions.text: bring up a topic for discussion
set in motion, start an event or prepare the way for
examples: Hitler's attack on Poland led up to World War II
